name: Ext_R4_MessageHeader_enterer
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MessageHeader.enterer for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MessageHeader.enterer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MessageHeader|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The source of the data entry
element.definition: The person or device that performed the data entry leading to this message. When there is more than one candidate, pick the most proximal to the message. Can provide other enterers in extensions.
element.comment: `MessageHeader.enterer` has no related element in R5:MessageHeader
